original_text: for Herod feared John, knowing that he was a righteous and holy man, and he kept him safe. When he heard him, he was greatly perplexed, and yet he heard him gladly.
korean_text: 헤롯이 요한을 의롭고 거룩한 사람으로 알고 두려워하여 보호하며 또 그의 말을 들을 때에 크게 번민을 하면서도 달갑게 들음이러라

sentences.original_text: knowing that he was a righteous and holy man
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 의롭고 거룩한 사람인 줄 알았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: and yet he heard him gladly
sentences.korean_translation: 그럼에도 불구하고 그는 기쁘게 그의 말을 들었다
